properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
(Ee Bwana, x3
nakuinulia nafsi yangu). x2
(Ee Mungu nimekutumaini), x3
wewe nisiaibike milele. x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Ee Bwana unijulishe
nijulishe njia,
unifundishe mapito yako.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Niongoze katika kweli
katika kweli yako,
uniongoze na kunifundisha.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Bwana Mungu ni mwema
sana pia.
Ni mwenye adili atawafundisha
wenye dhambi.
